12 Command IDLEState::run()
13 {
14  ROS_INFO("Waiting for new command...");
15  ros::Rate rate(50);
16  while(command.state == -1)
17  {
18  ros::spinOnce();
19  rate.sleep();
20  }
21  ROS_INFO("New command has been recieved: %d", command.state);
22  return command;
23 }
